title: Drainage Solution Proposal
description: Comprehensive drainage solution for waterfront property

sections.title: Problem Assessment
sections.content: Current drainage issues causing standing water and potential foundation problems.

sections.title: Proposed Solution
sections.content: Installation of French drain system with native water-tolerant plantings.

sections.title: Timeline
sections.content: Project completion estimated at 3 weeks from start date.

notes: Proposal includes 2-year warranty on drainage system

title: HOA Common Area Refresh
description: Modern landscaping design for neighborhood common areas

sections.title: Current State Analysis
sections.content: Existing landscaping is dated and requires high maintenance.

sections.title: Design Concept
sections.content: Contemporary design with drought-resistant plants and improved lighting.

sections.title: Maintenance Plan
sections.content: Reduced maintenance requirements with native and adapted plants.

notes: Pricing includes 10% discount for HOA members

title: Therapeutic Garden Design
description: Healing garden for medical center patients and visitors

sections.title: Therapeutic Benefits
sections.content: Research-backed plant selections for stress reduction and healing.

sections.title: Accessibility Features
sections.content: ADA-compliant pathways and raised planters for wheelchair access.

sections.title: Maintenance Protocol
sections.content: Low-maintenance design with seasonal care schedule.

notes: Proposal pending budget approval from medical center board

title: Organic Garden Expansion
description: Addition of organic vegetable garden and composting area

sections.title: Organic Certification
sections.content: All materials and methods will meet organic certification standards.

sections.title: Seasonal Planning
sections.content: Four-season garden design with succession planting schedule.

notes: Client decided to postpone organic garden project

title: Annual Maintenance Contract
description: Comprehensive year-round maintenance for commercial property

sections.title: Service Schedule
sections.content: Weekly maintenance visits with seasonal deep cleaning services.

sections.title: Emergency Services
sections.content: 24-hour emergency response for storm damage and urgent issues.

notes: Annual contract with 5% discount for early payment
